summary: Survey360 New Features Testing Complete - All Features Working. Fixed 1 bug in Skip Logic UI.

bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.issue: Skip Logic UI SelectItem had empty value causing runtime error: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'
bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.fix: Changed <SelectItem value=""> to <SelectItem value="always_show"> and updated handler to convert 'always_show' back to null

login.details: Login with demo@survey360.io / Test123! works correctly

survey_builder_settings.details: Settings panel shows: Close Date (datetime-local input), Max Responses (number input), Thank You Message (textarea), Brand Color (color picker)

skip_logic_ui.details: Skip Logic (Show if...) appears for questions after single_choice questions. Dropdown allows selecting which question to condition on.

share_modal.details: Share modal has 3 tabs: Link (public URL + copy button), QR Code (scannable QR + download button), Embed (full iframe code + minimal version)

responses_page.details: Responses tab shows list of all responses with respondent name, email, survey name, status, time, submission date

analytics_tab.details: Analytics tab enabled when specific survey selected. API returns chart_data with bar/pie chart data for choice questions

public_form_skip_logic.details: Skip logic works - Q3 (Rating) shows when Very Satisfied selected, hides when other option selected

public_form_thank_you.details: Custom thank you message 'Thank you for your valuable feedback! We appreciate your time.' displayed after submission

public_form_brand_color.details: Custom purple brand color (#8b5cf6) applied to logo icon and checkmark in thank you modal

seed_data_creation: Updated E2E Test Survey with brand_color=#8b5cf6, thank_you_message, and skip logic on Q3
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Survey360 new features (Close Date, Max Responses, Thank You Message, Brand Color, Skip Logic, QR Code, Embed) are working. Skip Logic bug in SelectItem fixed. Analytics API returns correct data for pie/bar charts.
